summary: Seriously, though, if Bran dies in Episode 3 of Game of Thrones tonight
title: Seriously, though, if Bran dies in Episode 3 of Game of Thrones tonight
body: …after Jojen, Summer and Hodor died; after Meera lost so much including her friend; after everything he went through to become the Three-Eyed-Whatever… without having done anything magical and just creepin’ about giving zinger one-liners I’ll be soooooo pissed off. I intend to meme this for the rest of the final season’s run if it happens:

blog.name: partywithponies
blog.title: Crying into my cheeky Nando's
blog.description:
Hi.
I love you.
Yes, you. You're beautiful.
And don't you forget it.
I'm Tasha, 23, from London, England. I love various British comedies, Death in Paradise, Father Brown, Doctor Who, Midsomer Murders, Eurovision, Casualty, Holby, old sci-fi, and many kid's shows (mostly CBBC, CBBC is my life.)
Feel free to send me an ask any time! Tell me about your day! Ask me about my OTPs! Tell me about your OTPs! I'll listen.

summary: An ideal version of GoT would be a version where it's literally nothing but scenes of Bran creeping people out while Sansa and...
body: An ideal version of GoT would be a version where it’s literally nothing but scenes of Bran creeping people out while Sansa and Arya proudly watch on like “this is my brother, he’s very weird and slightly terrifying, I love him so much”, all episode, every episode. Occasional filler scenes of Sansa having a lovely time and people being nice to her also acceptable.

reblog.comment: An ideal version of GoT would be a version where it’s literally nothing but scenes of Bran creeping people out while Sansa and Arya proudly watch on like “this is my brother, he’s very weird and slightly terrifying, I love him so much”, all episode, every episode. Occasional filler scenes of Sansa having a lovely time and people being nice to her also acceptable.

Occasional filler scenes of Sansa having a lovely time and people being nice to her also acceptable.

summary:
People think Jon Snow is the next Robb Stark. He is a fighter and a believer in the truth.  He is the next Young Wolf.
People...
body:
People think Jon Snow is the next Robb Stark. He is a fighter and a believer in the truth. He is the next Young Wolf.

People think Arya Stark is the next Robb Stark. She is determined and stubborn and brave. She is the next Young Wolf, along with her brother.

People think that Sansa Stark is the next Robb Stark. She is passionate and driven, and wholly believes in Northern Independance. She is not a fighter, but a politician. She is the next Ruler of the North.

The truth is that all the Stark children carry a little bit of Robb with them, in everything they do.

(People thought Bran Stark was the next Robb Stark. He was Winterfell’s little lord. But he went North, and a Raven flew back.)

The truth is that all the Stark children carry a little bit of Robb with them, in everything they do.

(People thought Bran Stark was the next Robb Stark. He was Winterfell’s little lord. But he went North, and a Raven flew back.)

People think that Sansa Stark is the next Robb Stark. She is passionate and driven, and wholly believes in Northern Independance. She is not a fighter, but a politician. She is the next Ruler of the North.

The truth is that all the Stark children carry a little bit of Robb with them, in everything they do.

blog.name: hereigocustomlego
blog.title: Here I Go
blog.description:
"... Then, without  knowing why, I began to run and kept running.
I took a bus, then an airplane,but they didn't move fast enough. Quickly, I sat on my bicycle and while laughing, I screamed HERE I GO !!!!!!"

- Angel Beccasino, journalist, musician and friend

Back in 2010, after several months of experimenting with Lego Bricks, creative designer Omar Ovalle decided to made his own unique versions of the Star Wars Lego series, complete with packaging design. This Tumblr Blog showcases these unique Star Wars Lego creations, not sold anywhere. 

More recently (2103) I created this series of Star Wars bounty hunters in a sculptural bust format.


The first bounty hunter I created was Embo. Initially it was just an exercise to challenge myself in a new direction and experiment with one of my favorite characters from the Clone Wars.

While working in the new format, I realized it was possible to give the bust so much detail including their weapons of choice. The format uses a smaller amount of bricks compared with the traditional big sets.

summary: What it's like to cuddle with Bran? 🐰
question: What it's like to cuddle with Bran? 🐰
answer:
we’re just gonna say this takes place in winterfell and imminent death is not looming over everyone ok?

-ahhh ok this boy is a cuddler

-he doesn’t want other people to know tho

-he’s the three eyed raven he has to be strong, he tells you

-but at night when everyone’s in bed and he’s sure no one will bother y’all he pulls you tight into his chest

-he holds onto you for dear life pretty much because he’s so terrified of losing someone else he loves

-he definitely whispers to you things like “i love you”s and “i don’t know how i’d live without you”s because i’m firm believer that when bran loves, he loves Hard

-once he’s sure you’re asleep, he’ll whisper deeper things like “i never wanted to be in love or get married until i met you” and “you make me feel so safe, y/n, you know that?” and “my mother would absolutely adore you” (the mother/son relationship between him and Catelyn makes me CRY and he’d want his mother to adore the woman he loves)

-he probably smells your hair too, occasionally pressing kisses into it

-lowkey never wants to leave because it’s so warm and cozy and safe and sound when he’s got his arms around you

summary: I feel Bran is really playing chess at the moment. He knows what is going to happen (he probably knows the end too) and he's...
question: I feel Bran is really playing chess at the moment. He knows what is going to happen (he probably knows the end too) and he's manipulating people so they can get in line with their destiny. The scene with Jamie, the war counsel meeting etc. all point to this. Jamie needs to do something important so he needs to live, the NK isn't going to be stopped with dragonfire but the characters don't need to know that yet. I feel WF HAS TO fall so everyone will go south where the real battle will be.
answer:
Hi anon,

I think there is definitely more going on with Bran that we have been told. I do believe he is withholding information and his declaration that he’s the Night King’s target was too easy. Usually, when there’s a big mystery you get clues to help you resolve it along with the characters, you don’t get usually told the answer, unceremoniously so. 

TTFN

blog.name: theladymeera
blog.title: I'm So Salty I'm a Pickle
blog.description:
Daenerys was my first fave and she will be my last.

Danielle, US. Meera is the frog queen of my heart but I post more about my dragon queen Dany. Trying to be a happy person against the will of all these nihilistic men.

This is my ASOIAF/GOT side blog. My main is a-mountain-girl, my booklr is readingaway.

summary: Top five Arya and Bran moments? (Like thoughts about each other, memories, other peoples memories about them as a pair etc)
question: Top five Arya and Bran moments? (Like thoughts about each other, memories, other peoples memories about them as a pair etc)
answer:
Huh, so again I’m too lazy & busy to get up, walk three feet to the bookshelf, and actually find quotes but…

- In AGOT when Arya remembers the prank Jon and Robb played on them all and she thinks of Bran as “Baby Bran” (because he was like 3), holds his hand, and punches Jon in the face for scaring him (not for scaring her or Sansa but for making Bran cry)

- Bran wishes he were a wolf so he could rescue Arya (and Sansa)

- Bran sees Arya everywhere - she’s the CotF Leaf, she’s in Meera, she’s in Lyanna

- Arya can’t accept that Bran (and Rickon) are dead

- Bran and Arya are confirmed to have been close playmates and used to play pranks on Sansa

Bonus - Bran reaches out to Arya via wolf dreams in TWOW
